title: ensure example configuration files have the correct LUCENE_MATCH_VERSION
description:
All Solr configuration test configs are always in sync based on build.xml, but the examples should always be up to speed.

I think also we should add this to the HowToRelease so its not forgotten when versions are bumped, we need to bump these versions in the example solrconfig.xml and multicore configs
